comments:

Joanna, This seems like a problem with the IAC Admin.

Hi Doug,

I downloaded Eclipse 3.2.2, emf 2.2.2, GEF 3.2.2, JEM 1.2.3, TPTP 4.3.1, and WTP 1.5.3 (all from TPTP 4.3.1 page with Eclipse from archive.eclipse.org), I was able to start profiling the Tomcat 5.5.   Did you set JRE to 1.5 in Java compiler and installed JRE and set Tomcat JRE to 1.5 (from Windows Preferences).

My .log does not have the error you got. The error is most likely caused by a bug which has been fix in the latest code (4.5 development build.   And my server status changed from 'starting...' to 'profiling...' very quickly (about 5 seconds). 

I didn't try JBoss.

If you still have problem with these setttings, please let me know.

Hi Bing,

I'm using Eclipse 3.3.0, EMF 2.3.0, GEF 3.3.0, TPTP 4.4.1 and I couldn't find anything about JEM in my Eclipse help. And I also didn't changed the compiler level of my IDE (it is currently set to 6.0).

Thank you,

Douglas

Hi Doug,

1.6 is not supported by TPTP yet. So please change the java level to 1.5 by doing the following:


1. Select Window -> Preferences....
2. Select Java -> Compiler and set level to 5.0.
3. Select Java -> Installed JREs and select a Java 1.5 JRE.  If you don't see one, you need to install one and add it.
4. Select Server, set 'Server timeout delay' to 'Unlimited' because Ti agent is really slow when profile server.
5. Select Server -> Installed Runtimes, then select Tomcat 5.5 and click 'Edit', make sure JRE is set to 1.5.
